text: Michigan's 6th congressional district is a United States congressional district in southeast Michigan. In 2022, the district was redrawn to be mainly around Ann Arbor and Washtenaw County, as well as western and southern Wayne County, a small part of southwestern Oakland County, and the city of Milan in Monroe County. The district is currently represented by Democrat Debbie Dingell, who represented the old 12th district before. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of Michigan
title: Michigan's 6th congressional district
